title: Creatio maintenance | Creatio Academy
content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.0 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.0 Clean up the drive space Compile an app on a web farm Improve page loading time Limit thread count for DB queries Query management rules
markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.0**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/category/creatio-maintenance)** (8.3).

Version: 8.0[Clean up the drive space](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/creatio-maintenance/clean_up_the_drive_space)[Compile an app on a web farm](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/creatio-maintenance/compile_app_on_web_farm)[Improve page loading time](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/creatio-maintenance/process_complex_database_queries_faster)[Limit thread count for DB queries](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/creatio-maintenance/limit_DB_thread_count)[Query management rules](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/creatio-maintenance/manage_resource_intensive_queries)
